Articles.Content: Yay, amazing idea! Cannot imagine better idols for future Space exploration Heroes!
Shut up and take my funds!

> 
> Shut up and take my funds!

^^ What he said!

Great idea trevize1138!
I've seen a similar concept, except with coffe mugs. Great idea!
Can this *please* be official merchandise? I neeeeeeeeed! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Too bad my refrigerator is stainless steel ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif). I would've bought them in a jiffy. But that's a awesome dinosaur. I wonder if kerbals had dinosaurs...

> 
> But that's a awesome dinosaur. I wonder if kerbals had dinosaurs...

You are now obliged to build it. Or the OP. Whichever one feels like it.
